# Illusion (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Akadi, Azuth, [[Baravar Cloakshadow]], Cyric, Mystra, Sehanine Moonbow. |

**Granted Powers:** You cast all illusion spells at +1 caster level. 

**Illusion Domain Spells**

**1 [[Silent Image (Spell)|Silent Image]]:** Creates minor illusion of your design.

**2 [[Minor Image (Spell)|Minor Image]]:** As *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]*, plus some sound.

**3 [[Displacement (Spell)|Displacement]]:** Attacks miss subject 50%.

**4 [[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|Phantasmal Killer]]:** Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

**5 [[Persistent Image (Spell)|Persistent Image]]:** *As [[Major Image (Spell)|major image]],* but no concentration required.

**6 [[Mislead (Spell)|Mislead]]:** Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

**7 [[Project Image (Spell)|Project Image]]:** Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

**8 [[Screen (Spell)|Screen]]:** Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.

**9 [[Weird (Spell)|Weird]]:** As *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]],* but affects all within 30 ft.
